TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DbConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public Class DbConnectionStringBuilder Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor, IDictionary
type DbConnectionStringBuilder = class interface IDictionary interface ICustomTypeDescriptor interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供强类型化连接字符串生成器的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for strongly typed connection string builders.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的基类从其强类型化的连接字符串生成器 (， ，依次类推) 派生。The class provides the base class from which the strongly typed connection string builders (, , and so on) derive. 连接字符串生成器，开发人员以编程方式创建语法正确的连接字符串和分析并重新生成现有的连接字符串。The connection string builders let developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings. 已定义数据库不可知的方式。The has been defined in a database-agnostic manner. 由于添加了命名空间，开发人员需要依据他们能够编程以便生成可对任意数据库的连接字符串的基类。Because of the addition of the namespace, developers require a base class against which they can program in order to build connection strings that can work against an arbitrary database. 因此，类允许用户将分配任意键/值对，并将生成的连接字符串传递给强类型化的提供程序。Therefore, the class lets users assign arbitrary key/value pairs and pass the resulting connection string to a strongly typed provider. 是.NET Framework 的一部分包含的所有数据提供程序都提供的强类型的类继承自: ， ， ，和。All the data providers that are included as part of the .NET Framework provide a strongly typed class that inherits from : , , , and . 开发人员可以构建、 分配和编辑连接字符串的任意提供程序。The developer can build, assign, and edit connection strings for any arbitrary provider. 对于支持特定的键/值对的提供程序，连接字符串生成器提供了已知对相对应的强类型的属性。For providers that support specific key/value pairs, the connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known pairs. 为了支持需要的功能以支持未知的值提供程序，开发人员还可以提供任意键/值对。In order to support providers that require the ability to support unknown values, developers can also supply arbitrary key/value pairs. 类实现 接口。The class implements the interface. 这意味着在设计时类适用于 Visual Studio 设计器。This means that the class works with Visual Studio designers at design time. 当开发人员使用设计器生成强类型化数据集和强类型化的连接 Visual Studio 中时，强类型化的连接字符串生成器类将显示其类型与关联的属性，并且也会有可以转换器映射为已知键的常用值。When developers use the designer to build strongly typed DataSets and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys. 开发人员无需创建连接字符串，可以使用应用程序的一部分类或其强类型化的派生类来生成和修改连接字符串之一。Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the class or one of its strongly typed derivatives to build and modify connection strings. 类还可以轻松管理存储在应用程序配置文件中的连接字符串。The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file. 开发人员可以创建连接字符串使用强类型化的连接字符串生成器类，也可以使用类。Developers can create connection strings using either a strongly typed connection string builder class, or they can use the class. 键/值对的有效性会执行任何检查。The performs no checks for valid key/value pairs. 因此，使用此类可能会创建出无效的连接字符串。Therefore, it is possible using this class to create invalid connection strings. 支持仅键/值对支持的 SQL Server; 尝试添加无效对会引发异常。The supports only key/value pairs that are supported by SQL Server; trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception. 这两个方法和属性句柄尝试插入恶意项。Both the method and property handle tries to insert malicious entries. 例如，下面的代码正确转义嵌套的键/值对：For example, the following code correctly escapes the nested key/value pair: ```vb Dim builder As New System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "(local)" builder("integrated sSecurity") = True builder("Initial Catalog") = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` ```csharp System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "(local)"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["Initial Catalog"] = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; ``` 结果为以下连接字符串，该字符串以安全方式处理无效值：The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` data source=(local);integrated security=True; initial catalog="AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序生成两个连接字符串、 Microsoft Jet 数据库和 SQL Server 数据库。The following console application builds two connection strings, one for a Microsoft Jet database, and one for a SQL Server database. 在每种情况下，代码使用一个泛型类，以创建连接字符串，然后将属性的到构造函数的强类型连接类的实例。In each case, the code uses a generic class to create the connection string, and then passes the property of the instance to the constructor of the strongly type connection class. 这不是必需的;代码可能也已创建单独的强类型化的连接字符串生成器实例。This is not required; the code could also have created individual strongly typed connection string builder instances. 该示例还分析现有的连接字符串，并演示了操作的连接字符串的内容的各种方法。The example also parses an existing connection string, and demonstrates various ways of manipulating the connection string's contents. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，可以选择使用 ODBC 规则来引用值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, optionally using ODBC rules for quoting values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`useOdbcRules`是`true`，则此使用 ODBC 规则来引用值 (使用大括号括起值 ({}))。If `useOdbcRules` is `true`, this uses ODBC rules for quoting values (surrounding values with curly braces ({})). 如果`useOdbcRules`是`false`，则此使用引号字符 ("") 来分隔的值。If `useOdbcRules` is `false`, this uses quotation mark character ("") to delimit values.

span.span: Adds an entry with the specified key and value into the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性还可用于不存在的键的值设置字典中添加新元素。The property can also be used to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary. 例如：`myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。For example: `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 调用方法并传递 null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 密钥，则会引发。Calling the method by passing a null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) key throws an . 但是，调用方法并传递 null 值中移除键/值对。However, calling the method by passing a null value removes the key/value pair. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新并添加项。The following example creates a new and adds items. 代码还演示了如何覆盖项使用的现有方法，并包括会引发的注释的块。The code also demonstrates overwriting an existing item using the method, and includes a commented block that would throw an . > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 提供了一种有效而安全的方法，用于将键和值附加到现有的 对象中。

span.span: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许使用的开发人员若要创建的键/值对，以便能够充分利用中包括的功能集合类时无需创建的系统开销添加键/值对，并维护实例。This method allows developers using a to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the class when you add key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a instance. `AppendKeyValuePair`方法正确设置的键和值的格式并将新字符串添加到所提供。The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied . ## Examples 如果某一进程已创建的连接字符串，但现在应用程序必须执行简单修改该连接字符串，它可能更高效，只需添加键/值对使用对象。If some process has created a connection string, but now an application must perform a simple modification to that connection string, it may be more efficient to just add the key/value pair using a object. 而不是创建一个新，开发人员可调用`AppendKeyValuePair`方法，传入，其中包含提供的连接字符串。Instead of creating a new , developers can call the `AppendKeyValuePair` method, passing in a that contains the supplied connection string. 以下过程显示了此技术的简单示例。The following procedure shows a simple example of this technique. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 提供了一种有效而安全的方法，用于将键和值附加到现有的 对象中。

span.span: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许使用的开发人员若要创建的键/值对，以便能够充分利用中包括的功能集合类时无需创建的系统开销添加键/值对和维护实例。This method allows developers using a to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the class when adding key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a instance. `AppendKeyValuePair`方法正确设置的键和值的格式并将新字符串添加到所提供。The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied . 虽然大多数数据源允许您通过使用引号分隔字段时，ODBC 不支持-对于 ODBC 连接字符串，必须使用大括号 ({})。Although most data sources let you delimit fields by using quotation marks, ODBC does not--for ODBC connection strings, you must use curly braces ({}). 为了获得使用 ODBC 规则来分隔字段，设置`useOdbcRules`参数`true`。In order to have the use ODBC rules for delimiting fields, set the `useOdbcRules` parameter to `true`. ## Examples 如果某一进程已创建的连接字符串，但现在应用程序必须进行简单修改该连接字符串，它可能会更有效，只需添加键/值对使用对象。If some process has created a connection string, but now an application must perform a simple modification to that connection string, it might be more efficient to just add the key/value pair using a object. 而不是创建一个新，开发人员可调用`AppendKeyValuePair`方法，传入，其中包含提供的连接字符串。Instead of creating a new , developers can call the `AppendKeyValuePair` method, passing in a that contains the supplied connection string. 以下过程显示了此技术，使用 ODBC 规则来引用值的简单示例。The following procedure shows a simple example of this technique, using ODBC rules for quoting values. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair/VB/source.vb#1)]

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建利用设计器的开发人员类必须是能够显示或隐藏在设计器的属性网格中进行的连接字符串。Developers creating designers that take advantage of the class must be able to make the connection string visible or invisible within the designer's property grid. 属性，允许开发人员指示该属性，应通过将属性设置为在不可见`false`。The property lets developers indicate that the property should be invisible by setting the property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ConnectionString { get; set; }
.property instance string ConnectionString
Public Property ConnectionString As String
public: property System::String ^ ConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ConnectionString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与 相关联的连接字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the connection string associated with the .

value.span: 使用 中包含的键/值对创建的当前连接字符串。

span.span: The current connection string, created from the key/value pairs that are contained within the .

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回以分号分隔的存储中维护的集合的键/值对列表。This property returns a semicolon-delimited list of key/value pairs stored within the collection maintained by the . 每个对包含的键和值，由一个等号分隔。Each pair contains the key and value, separated by an equal sign. 下面的示例说明了典型的连接字符串。The following example illustrates a typical connection string. ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=SSPI;Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Data Source=(local)" ``` 数据提供程序可能希望特定的键和值的每个连接字符串属性。Data providers may expect specific keys and values for each connection string property. 分别记录了这些值。, These values are documented individually. 类不会验证其连接字符串，与关联的键/值对，尽管可以从其继承的类。The class does not validate the key/value pairs associated with its connection string, although classes that inherit from it can. 属性的类通常充当一种机制用于创建和分析以分号分隔的键/值对列表使用等号分隔。The property of the class acts generally as a mechanism for creating and parsing semicolon-delimited lists of key/value pairs separated with equal signs. 它提供任何验证或其他支持特定于连接字符串。It provides no validation or other support specific to connection strings. 如果你将项添加到集合，属性将反映所做的更改。If you add items to the collection, the property will reflect the changes. 如果你将值赋给属性，将尝试分析使用的以分号和等号分隔符的值。If you assign a value to the property, the will try to parse the value, using the semicolon and equal-sign delimiters. ## Examples 下面的示例演示可能具有的行为属性。The following example demonstrates possible behaviors of the property. 下面的示例：The example: - 创建一个连接字符串通过将键/值对，一次一个地添加到一个空。Creates a connection string by adding key/value pairs, one at a time, to an empty . - 分配到一个完整的连接字符串属性的实例，并修改字符串内的单个键/值对。Assigns a complete connection string to the property of the instance, and modifies a single key/value pair within the string. - 将分配到的键/值对的任意一组属性 （即，不像远程连接字符串的字符串），并修改的值之一。Assigns an arbitrary set of key/value pairs to the property (that is, a string that is not anything remotely like a connection string), and modifies one of the values. - 分配到一个无效的连接字符串属性，并阐释引发的异常。Assigns an invalid connection string to the property, demonstrating the exception that is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: connectionStringBuilder
param.span: 要与此 对象进行比较的 。

span.span: The to be compared with this object.

summary.span: 将此 对象中的连接信息与提供的对象中的连接信息进行比较。

span.span: Compares the connection information in this object with the connection information in the supplied object.

returns.span: 如果两个 对象中的连接信息生成等效的连接字符串，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the connection information in both of the objects causes an equivalent connection string; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在键名称比较不区分大小写;值的比较是区分大小写。Comparisons on key names are case insensitive; value comparisons are case sensitive. 方法将返回`true`键/值对是否相等，而不考虑其顺序。The method returns `true` if the key/value pairs are equal, regardless of their order. 两个连接字符串的连接行为是等效的因为顺序并不重要的连接字符串中。The connection behavior of the two connection strings are equivalent, because order is never significant within connection strings. 但是，不同的顺序可能会影响连接池行为的基于这些连接字符串的连接。However, different order may affect connection pooling behavior of connections based on these connection strings. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.EquivalentTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.EquivalentTo/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.EquivalentTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.EquivalentTo/VB/source.vb#1)] 本示例将显示以下输出：This sample displays the following output: ``` builder1 = value1=SomeValue;value2=20;value3=30;value4=40 builder2 = value2=20;value3=30;value4=40;value1=SomeValue builder3 = value2=20;value3=30;value4=40;value1=SOMEVALUE builder1.EquivalentTo(builder2) = True builder2.EquivalentTo(builder3) = False ```

span.span: Working with Connection Strings

Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean

member this.IsFixedSize : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否具有固定大小。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 具有固定大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 固定大小的集合不允许添加或删除元素后创建集合，但是它的确允许修改现有元素。A fixed-size collection does not allow adding or removing elements after the collection is created, but it does allow modifying existing elements. 固定大小集合是只具有添加和删除元素，则会阻止的包装器的集合因此，如果在更改基础集合，包括添加或删除元素，大小固定集合反映了这些更改。A fixed-size collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including adding or removing elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.

value.span: 如果 为只读，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只读集合不允许添加、 删除或修改后创建集合的元素。A read-only collection does not allow adding, removing, or modifying elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是防止集合; 进行修改的包装器具有一系列因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合反映了这些更改。A read-only collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.

span.span: Gets an that contains the keys in the .

value.span: 一个 ，它包含 中的键。

span.span: An that contains the keys in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值的顺序未指定，但与 属性返回的 中的关联值顺序相同。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the returned by the property. 返回不是静态副本，而是，反过来引用在原始密钥。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original . 因此，更改为反映在。Therefore, changes to the are reflected in the . ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序示例创建一个新，并添加了一些键。The following console application example creates a new , and adds some keys. 该代码循环访问返回的属性显示键/值对，，然后添加新的密钥。The code loops through the returned by the property displaying the key/value pairs, and then adds a new key. 因为属性返回动态，第二个循环显示所有键/值对，其中包括最新的项。Because the property returns a dynamic , the second loop displays all the key/value pairs, including the newest item. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.span: 要检索的项的键。

param.name: value
param.span: 与 key 对应的值。

span.span: The value corresponding to the key.

summary.span: 从此 中检索与提供的键相对应的值。

span.span: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this .

returns.span: 如果在连接字符串中找到 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if was found within the connection string, otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许开发人员安全地检索值而无需先调用方法。The method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a without needing to first call the method. 因为不会引发异常时调用它，传入不存在的键，不需要检索其值之前查找键。Because does not raise an exception when you call it, passing in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value. 调用不存在的键会将 null 值 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 中`value`参数。Calling with a nonexistent key will place the null value (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法，演示几个可能的结果。The following example calls the method, demonstrating several possible outcomes. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/VB/source.vb#1)] 此示例显示以下结果：The sample displays the following results: ``` Provider=sqloledb DATA SOURCE=192.168.168.1,1433 Unable to retrieve value for //InvalidKey// Unable to retrieve value for null key. ```

exception.span: 包含一个 null 值（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: contains a null value ( in Visual Basic).
Working with Connection Strings
ADO.NET Overview

member this.Values : System.Collections.ICollection

summary.span: 获取包含 中的值的 。

span.span: Gets an that contains the values in the .
An that contains the values in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值的顺序未指定，但它是中的关联键的顺序相同返回的方法。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the returned by the method. 返回不是静态副本，而是，表示返回的值在原始。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the values in the original . 因此，更改为反映在。Therefore, changes to the are reflected in the . ## Examples > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values/VB/source.vb#1)] 将显示以下输出：Displays the following output: ``` MSDataShape.1 false MSDAORA orac username ******* ```
